objects.text:
• Kitty Tower Playset
• 2 Adorable Cats
• Spinning Palm Tree
• Includes Food & Toys

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This playful and vibrant banner features a dynamic layout designed for a children's product advertisement. The background is composed of layered geometric shapes and soft pastel gradients, overlaid with translucent circles and abstract diagonal patterns for visual interest. The main heading (`heading`) in bold, cheerful pink font sets a bright and engaging tone, followed by a dynamic subheading (`subheading`) in vibrant purple. The product details (`description`) are presented as bullet points in a clear and readable purple font. At the bottom, a bold price tag (`price`) in deep pink grabs attention, along with a purple call-to-action button (`cta_button`) complemented by white text (`cta`). A colorful, high-resolution image of the toy product (`product_image`) is positioned on the right side as the focal point.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink (#FFE6F2)
- Soft Rose (#FFCCE8)
- Lavender Blush (#FFD6ED)
- Bubblegum Pink (#FFB7DE)
- Bright Pink (#E91E63)
- Deep Purple (#9C27B0)
- Indigo (#6A1B9A)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Mint Green & Beige touches through vector shapes
product_color: The product image exhibits a bright and playful color palette ideal for attracting children’s attention and creating a cheerful advertisement. Key colors include hot pink (#F653A2) used on the cat house, giving a lively and bold focal point, and vibrant mint green (#45C3A4) on the grassy platform and leaves, adding freshness and balance. Accents of purple (#B983CE), blue (#52C4DD), and red-pink (#ED2862) provide contrasting details that highlight accessories and features. Soft peach (#F4CBA3) is used on the structure base, blending well with the beige (#F8E4CC) columns to create grounding warmth. The harmonious combination of vivid and pastel tones enhances visibility while maintaining a cohesive, whimsical theme.
